Docs.param: A containing a collection of FLAC metadata boxes.
Docs.summary: Constructs and initializes a new instance of for a specified collection of FLAC metadata blocks.

MemberSignature.Value: public TagLib.Ogg.XiphComment GetComment (bool create, TagLib.Tag copy);

Docs.param: A indicating whether or not the Xiph Comment should be duplicated.
A containing values to copy to copy to the new tag, if one is created.
Docs.summary: Gets the Vorbis Comment stored in the current instance, optionally creating one.
Docs.returns: A containing the comment data stored in the current instance.

Docs.summary: Removes the Vorbis comment block from the current instance.
This class is used to access and manipulate metadata stored in FLAC files.
Docs.remarks: At the time of this writing, only Vorbis comments and picture data is supported.
